rukus.text: Ibuka ubwo Allah yavugaga ati "Yewe Isa (Yesu)! Mu by’ukuri, njye ndakuzuriza igihe cyawe (cyo kuba ku isi), nkuzamure iwanjye, ngukize abahakanye, kandi abagukurikiye nzabarutisha abahakanye kugeza ku munsi w’imperuka. Hanyuma muzagaruka iwanjye mazembakiranure mu byo mutavugagaho rumwe
Naho babandi bahakanye nzabahanisha ibihano bikaze ku isi no ku mperuka, kandintibazabona ababatabara
Naho babandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza, ( Allah ) azabagororera ingororano zabo zuzuye, kandi Allah ntakunda abanyamahugu
Ibi tugusomera ni ibimenyetso n’urwibutso byuje ubushishozi
Mu by’ukuri, urugero rwa Isa (Yesu) kwa Allah ni nk’urwaAdamu (mu iremwa ryabo bombi). Yamuremye mu gitaka maze aramubwira ati "Ba!"Ubwo abaho
(Uku) ni ukuri guturutse kwa Nyagasani wawe, bityo ntukabe mu bashidikanya

Bityo, abazakugisha impaka ku birebana na we (Yesu) nyuma y’ubu bumenyi bukugezeho, uzavuge (yewe Muhamadi) uti" Nimuze duhamagare abana bacun’abana banyu, abagore bacu n’abagore banyu, na twe ubwacu na mwe ubwanyu, hanyuma dutakambe dusaba ko umuvumo wa Allah uba ku babeshyi
Rwose izi ni zo nkuru (za Yesu) z’ukuri. Kandi ntawe ukwiye gusengwa mu kuri uretse Allah. Kandimu by’ukuri, Allah ni we Nyirimbaraga zihebuje, Ushishoza
Kandi nibatera umugongo (bakanga kwemera ibi bimenyetso), mu by’ukuri Allah azi neza abangizi
